
c.c_drillLicenseNo
,c.c_wellNo
,CASE
    WHEN c.id <> "" THEN c.c_licenseNameReq
    ELSE a.c_drillLicenseeFullname
END AS licenseNameReq
,c.c_licenseAddressNo
,c.c_licenseMoo
,c.c_licenseSoi
,c.c_licenseStreet
,c.c_licenseTambon
,c.c_licenseAmphoe
,c.c_licenseProvince
,c.c_licensePostalCode
,c.c_licensePhoneNumber
,c.c_wellAddressNo
,c.c_wellMoo
,c.c_wellSoi
,c.c_wellStreet
,c.c_wellTambon
,c.c_wellAmphoe
,c.c_wellProvince
,c.c_wellPostalCode
,c.c_comDrillerName
,c.c_comDrillerAddressNo
,c.c_comDrillerMoo
,c.c_comDrillerSoi
,c.c_comDrillerStreet
,c.c_comDrillerTambon
,c.c_comDrillerAmphoe
,c.c_comDrillerProvince
,c.c_comDrillerPostalCode
,c.c_comDrillerPhoneNumber
,CASE
    WHEN c.id <> "" THEN c.c_gwDrillerName
    ELSE b.c_gwDrillerName
END AS gwDrillerName
,CASE
    WHEN c.id <> "" THEN c.c_gwDrillerID
    ELSE b.c_gwDrillerID
END AS gwDrillerID
,c.c_gwDrillerAddressNo
,c.c_gwDrillerMoo
,c.c_gwDrillerSoi
,c.c_gwDrillerStreet
,c.c_gwDrillerTambon
,c.c_gwDrillerAmphoe
,c.c_gwDrillerProvince
,c.c_gwDrillerPostalCode
,c.c_gwDrillerPhoneNumber
FROM app_fd_dgr_regis_license AS a
INNER JOIN app_fd_dgr_date_drill AS b
ON a.id = b.c_parentID
INNER JOIN app_fd_dgr_nbt345 AS c
ON a.id = b.id
WHERE a.id = der","properties":{"jdbcDatasource":"default","sql":"SELECT

,CASE
    WHEN c.id <> "" THEN c.c_licenseName
    ELSE a.c_drillLicenseeFullname
END AS licenseName
,c.c_gwDrillerSignature
,c.c_gwDrillerNameDis
,c.c_geologistSignature
,c.c_geologistName
